description: Basic patient search by ID or Name (using OpenMRS's standard patient search)

configOptions.name: afterSelectedUrl
configOptions.description: URL to go to after the user selects a patient. Supports {{patientId}}

configOptions.name: label
configOptions.description: Label used by the find patient widget

configOptions.name: heading
configOptions.description: Heading used by the find patient widget

configOptions.name: showLastViewedPatients
configOptions.description: Whether or not to show a list of the recently-viewed patients for the current user

configOptions.name: breadcrumbs
configOptions.description: If specified, list of breadcrumbs for this page. ("label" will be translated, "link" will have /CONTEXTPATH prepended.) If not specified, default breadcrumbs are Home -> translate(label).

configOptions.name: registrationAppLink
configOptions.description: Link to the registration app to be used, the default value of blank hides the registration button on the search widget and other pages. This link should not include the context path as this is added

configOptions.name: patientPageUrl
configOptions.description: URL pointing to a patient details page

configOptions.name: patientPageUrl
configOptions.description: URL pointing to a patient details page

description: Lists relationships, and lets you edit them

configOptions.name: title
configOptions.description: Label to display (can be a message code)

configOptions.name: excludeRelationshipTypes
configOptions.description: List of UUIDs of relationship types not to show

description: Displays the most recent encounter of a specified type

configOptions.name: encounterDateLabel
configOptions.description: Message code for displaying last encounter date; code should have substitution element for date--for example 'Last Vitals On: {0}'

configOptions.name: definitionUiResource
configOptions.description: ui resource of html form to use when displaying the encounter (optional--if not specified, form associated with encounter is used
